code: var countIitialState=0;var countReducer=function countReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:countIitialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'INCREMENT':{return state+1;}case'DECREMENT':{return state-1;}default:{return state;}}};export default countReducer;
